examples: Graduates have to fight for jobs in an increasingly competitive market.
Los graduados tienen que luchar por puestos de trabajo en un mercado cada vez más competitivo.
Those businesses are operating in an extremely competitive environment.
Esas empresas operan en un entorno extremadamente competitivo.
The company has succeeded in a highly competitive industry.
La empresa ha tenido éxito en una industria altamente competitiva.
